description: Default service descriptions for barber shop tenants

services.title: Classic Haircut
services.shortDescription: Traditional men's haircut with precision and style
services.description: Our classic haircut includes consultation, precision cutting with scissors and clippers, detailed styling, and finishing touches. Whether you prefer a timeless look or contemporary style, our barbers deliver exceptional results.

services.title: Hot Towel Shave
services.description: Experience the luxury of a traditional hot towel shave. Our barbers use premium products and time-honored techniques to deliver the closest, smoothest shave possible.

services.title: Beard Trim & Shaping
services.description: Keep your beard looking sharp with our professional trim and shaping service. We sculpt and maintain your beard to complement your face shape and personal style.

services.title: Fade Haircut
services.shortDescription: Modern fade styles with precision blending
services.description: Get the perfect fade with our expert barbers. From low to high fades, skin fades to temp fades, we create crisp, clean fades with seamless blending.

services.title: Haircut & Shave Combo
services.description: Our most popular service combines a precision haircut with a traditional hot towel shave. Get the full barbershop experience and save time with our combo package.

services.title: Kids Haircut
services.description: We specialize in making kids' haircuts a fun, stress-free experience. Our patient barbers work with children of all ages to deliver great cuts in a friendly environment.
